newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai Lujiazui borrows $15m for subway station.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai Lujiazui borrows $15m for subway station.

text.p: Shanghai Lujiazui Finance and Trade Development Co has signed an agreement to borrow $15 million from the Bank of East Asia to build a subway station, a company official said on Friday.

The company is the parent of the Shanghai-listed firm Shanghai Lujiazui Finance and Trade Development Co Ltd which is the government's main property developer for the Lujiazui area of the Pudong development zone.
The official declined to give the interest rate or any other details of the loan.
Shanghai city has designated Lujiazui a financial centre and construction is under way of transport links to central Shanghai, including a subway line.
